nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 36 overnight. East wind 12 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain after 10am. Cloudy. High near 47, with temperatures falling to around 44 in the afternoon. East wind 16 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Light Rain then Rain And Snow Likely
nws.detailedForecast: Rain before midnight, then rain and snow likely. Cloudy. Low around 26, with temperatures rising to around 30 overnight. North wind 14 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow And Patchy Blowing Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 11am, then a chance of snow and patchy blowing snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 32. Northwest wind 15 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Snow
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 11. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 17. Northwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Cloudy, with a low around 5. Northwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

nws.name: Friday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 17. Northwest wind around 9 mph.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 4. North wind around 8 mph.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 19. Northwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 1. Northwest wind around 7 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 19. North wind around 8 mph.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 2. East wind around 8 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 26.
